references.paper_title: Self-supervised 6d object pose estimation for robot manipulation
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the current research because it focuses on self-supervised 6D object pose estimation, which is a crucial aspect of articulated object pose estimation.

references.paper_title: Deep multi-state object pose estimation for augmented reality assembly
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of estimating object poses in augmented reality, a field closely related to articulated object pose estimation.

references.paper_title: Total3dunderstanding: Joint layout, object pose and mesh reconstruction for indoor scenes from a single image
references.reason: This work tackles the comprehensive task of scene understanding, which includes object pose estimation, and thus provides a broader context for the current research.

references.paper_title: Geometric constraint co-attention network for 6d object pose estimation
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel network architecture for 6D object pose estimation, which can be applied and potentially improved for articulated object pose estimation.

references.paper_title: Densefusion: 6d object pose estimation by iterative dense fusion
references.reason: This work introduces a method for 6D object pose estimation, a fundamental task that directly relates to the core problem of articulated object pose estimation.
